hero.superTitle: Solid - A Complete SaaS Web Template
hero.body:
Solid Pro - Packed with all the key integrations you need for swift SaaS startup launch, including - Auth,
              Database, Sanity Blog, Essential Components, Pages and More. Built-winth - Next.js 13, React 18 and
              TypeScript.
hero.tryForFree: Try for free no credit card required.
